author: Rick Stein
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Place the garlic onto a baking sheet and drizzle with a little olive oil.  Sprinkle over a little rock salt and place in a hot oven for 20-30 minutes or until the cloves have softened. Squeeze out the garlic pur√©e from each clove and spread onto warmed bread.
ingredients: 6 plump bulbs of garlic, tops taken off,  olive oil, to drizzle,  rock salt ,  warmed rustic bread, to serve
